attributes.action: if you sell an automobile in the uk your insurance should be void
attributes.additional_details:
Please help sign. I always believed that once you sell something you are no longer liable for what the "New owner" does with it. I was wrong. Please read below & Share.
http://www.dailyrecord.co.uk/news/scottish-news/scots-biker-insurance-hell-after-4141840
